forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 2C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High around 35F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 33F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Some snow showers around in the morning. Then a wintry mix expected in the afternoon. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Freezing rain early will change to a wintry mix overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow and ice accumulations of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Freezing rain in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light freezing rain later at night. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light freezing rain later at night. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain in the morning...later changing to rain. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain in the morning changing to rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
